text.ascii: mArkaNDeya uvAca
text.ur: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca

text.ascii: kAzyapo hy atha vAsiSThaH prANaz ca prANaputrakaH
text.ur: kāśyapo hy atha vāsiṣṭhaḥ prāṇaś ca prāṇaputrakaḥ

text.ascii: agnir AGgirasaz caiva cyavanas triSuvarcakaH
text.ur: agnir āṅgirasaś caiva cyavanas triṣuvarcakaḥ

text.ascii: acaranta tapas tIvraM putrArthe bahuvArSikam
text.ur: acaranta tapas tīvraṁ putrārthe bahuvārṣikam

text.ascii: putraM labhema dharmiSThaM yazasA brahmaNA samam
text.ud: पुत्रं लभेम धर्मिष्ठं यशसा ब्रह्मणा समम्
text.ur: putraṁ labhema dharmiṣṭhaṁ yaśasā brahmaṇā samam

text.ascii: mahAvyAhRtibhir dhyAtaH paJcabhis tais tadA tv atha
text.ur: mahāvyāhr̥tibhir dhyātaḥ pañcabhis tais tadā tv atha

text.ascii: jajJe tejomayo 'rciSmAn paJcavarNaH prabhAvanaH
text.ur: jajñe tejomayo ’rciṣmān pañcavarṇaḥ prabhāvanaḥ

text.ascii: samiddho 'gniH ziras tasya bAhU sUryanibhau tathA
text.ur: samiddho ’gniḥ śiras tasya bāhū sūryanibhau tathā

text.ascii: tvaG netre ca suvarNAbhe kRSNe jaGghe ca bhArata
text.ud: त्वङ्नेत्रे च सुवर्णाभे कृष्णे जङ्घे च भारत
text.ur: tvaṅ netre ca suvarṇābhe kr̥ṣṇe jaṅghe ca bhārata

text.ascii: paJcavarNaH sa tapasA kRtas taiH paJcabhir janaiH
text.ur: pañcavarṇaḥ sa tapasā kr̥tas taiḥ pañcabhir janaiḥ

text.ascii: pAJcajanyaH zruto vede paJcavaMzakaras tu saH
text.ur: pāñcajanyaḥ śruto vede pañcavaṁśakaras tu saḥ

text.ascii: daza varSasahasrANi tapas taptvA mahAtapAH
text.ur: daśa varṣasahasrāṇi tapas taptvā mahātapāḥ

text.ascii: janayat pAvakaM ghoraM pitqNAM sa prajAH sRjan
text.ud: जनयत्पावकं घोरं पितॄणां स प्रजाः सृजन्
text.ur: janayat pāvakaṁ ghoraṁ pitr̥̄ṇāṁ sa prajāḥ sr̥jan

text.ascii: bRhad rathaMtaraM mUrdhno vaktrAc ca tarasAharau
text.ur: br̥had rathaṁtaraṁ mūrdhno vaktrāc ca tarasāharau

text.ascii: zivaM nAbhyAM balAd indraM vAyvagnI prANato 'sRjat
text.ur: śivaṁ nābhyāṁ balād indraṁ vāyvagnī prāṇato ’sr̥jat

text.ascii: bAhubhyAm anudAttau ca vizve bhUtAni caiva ha
text.ud: बाहुभ्यामनुदात्तौ च विश्वे भूतानि चैव ह
text.ur: bāhubhyām anudāttau ca viśve bhūtāni caiva ha

text.ascii: etAn sRSTvA tataH paJca pitqNAm asRjat sutAn
text.ur: etān sr̥ṣṭvā tataḥ pañca pitr̥̄ṇām asr̥jat sutān

text.ascii: bRhadUrjasya praNidhiH kAzyapasya bRhattaraH
text.ur: br̥hadūrjasya praṇidhiḥ kāśyapasya br̥hattaraḥ

text.ascii: bhAnur aGgiraso vIraH putro varcasya saubharaH
text.ur: bhānur aṅgiraso vīraḥ putro varcasya saubharaḥ

text.ascii: prANasya cAnudAttaz ca vyAkhyAtAH paJca vaMzajAH
text.ur: prāṇasya cānudāttaś ca vyākhyātāḥ pañca vaṁśajāḥ

text.ascii: devAn yajJamuSaz cAnyAn sRjan paJcadazottarAn
text.ur: devān yajñamuṣaś cānyān sr̥jan pañcadaśottarān

text.ascii: abhImam atibhImaM ca bhImaM bhImabalAbalam
text.ur: abhīmam atibhīmaṁ ca bhīmaṁ bhīmabalābalam

text.ascii: etAn yajJamuSaH paJca devAn abhyasRjat tapaH
text.ur: etān yajñamuṣaḥ pañca devān abhyasr̥jat tapaḥ

text.ascii: sumitraM mitravantaM ca mitrajJaM mitravardhanam
text.ur: sumitraṁ mitravantaṁ ca mitrajñaṁ mitravardhanam

text.ascii: mitradharmANam ity etAn devAn abhyasRjat tapaH
text.ur: mitradharmāṇam ity etān devān abhyasr̥jat tapaḥ

text.ascii: surapravIraM vIraM ca sukezaM ca suvarcasam
text.ud: सुरप्रवीरं वीरं च सुकेशं च सुवर्चसम्
text.ur: surapravīraṁ vīraṁ ca sukeśaṁ ca suvarcasam

text.ascii: surANAm api hantAraM paJcaitAn asRjat tapaH
text.ur: surāṇām api hantāraṁ pañcaitān asr̥jat tapaḥ

text.ascii: trividhaM saMsthitA hy ete paJca paJca pRthak pRthak
text.ud: त्रिविधं संस्थिता ह्येते पञ्च पञ्च पृथक्पृथक्
text.ur: trividhaṁ saṁsthitā hy ete pañca pañca pr̥thak pr̥thak

text.ascii: muSNanty atra sthitA hy ete svargato yajJayAjinaH
text.ur: muṣṇanty atra sthitā hy ete svargato yajñayājinaḥ

text.ascii: teSAm iSTaM haranty ete nighnanti ca mahad bhuvi
text.ur: teṣām iṣṭaṁ haranty ete nighnanti ca mahad bhuvi

text.ascii: spardhayA havyavAhAnAM nighnanty ete haranti ca
text.ur: spardhayā havyavāhānāṁ nighnanty ete haranti ca

text.ascii: havir vedyAM tad AdAnaM kuzalaiH saMpravartitam
text.ur: havir vedyāṁ tad ādānaṁ kuśalaiḥ saṁpravartitam

text.ascii: tad ete nopasarpanti yatra cAgniH sthito bhavet
text.ud: तदेते नोपसर्पन्ति यत्र चाग्निः स्थितो भवेत्
text.ur: tad ete nopasarpanti yatra cāgniḥ sthito bhavet

text.ascii: cito 'gnir udvahan yajJaM pakSAbhyAM tAn prabAdhate
text.ur: cito ’gnir udvahan yajñaṁ pakṣābhyāṁ tān prabādhate

text.ascii: mantraiH prazamitA hy ete neSTaM muSNanti yajJiyam
text.ud: मन्त्रैः प्रशमिता ह्येते नेष्टं मुष्णन्ति यज्ञियम्
text.ur: mantraiḥ praśamitā hy ete neṣṭaṁ muṣṇanti yajñiyam

text.ascii: bRhadukthatapasyaiva putro bhUmim upAzritaH
text.ur: br̥hadukthatapasyaiva putro bhūmim upāśritaḥ

text.ascii: agnihotre hUyamAne pRthivyAM sadbhir ijyate
text.ur: agnihotre hūyamāne pr̥thivyāṁ sadbhir ijyate

text.ascii: rathaMtaraz ca tapasaH putro 'gniH paripaThyate
text.ur: rathaṁtaraś ca tapasaḥ putro ’gniḥ paripaṭhyate

text.ascii: mitravindAya vai tasya havir adhvaryavo viduH
text.ur: mitravindāya vai tasya havir adhvaryavo viduḥ

text.ascii: mumude paramaprItaH saha putrair mahAyazAH
text.ur: mumude paramaprītaḥ saha putrair mahāyaśāḥ
